item.title: Welcome to Hugo-Geo!
item.author: jeff.w.hollister@gmail.com (Jeffrey W. Hollister)
item.description: Welcome to hugo-geo, a resposive theme for the Hugo static site generator. Hugo is designed for post and tutorial sections, and is perfect for personal portfolio or blog sites. Why don’t you check out the Getting Started Tutorial and find out how you can use hugo-geo and customize it to your liking.
